text: Hannde on daginanaama laaɓuɗi ɗin. Ñaametee okkaaɓe Defte ɓen no daganii on, ñaametee mon on no daganii ɓe. E saŋiiɓe gomɗimɓe ɓen, e saŋiiɓe okkaaɓe Defte ɓen ado mon, si on jonnii ɓe teŋeeji maɓɓe ɗin, [wonon] saŋiiɓe hara wanaa jeenooɓe, wanaa jogitotooɓe njaatigi. Kala yeddu- ɗo gomɗinal ngal, gomɗii golle makko ɗen bonii, on ɗon ka laakara ko o jeyaaɗo e hayruɓe(pertube) ɓen
